column4: I am trying to get a edubuntu ltsp client to boot it is stopping after printing "Starting LTSP client     [OK]" :( what is wrong ? how do I get it to continue ?
is it hanging or returning to a prompt
if I hit <enter> I get a prompt
ok, once you hit enter, is ltsp running ?
I don't know what you mean by ltsp running ?  it won't let me login !
when you reboot, does it hang ?
when you have the script started are any of the ltsp processes running
it's better to use the desktop version
use the desktop cd if you want a desktop
why are you using the server version ?
what is the driver for using the server version
setup of RAID etc.
the desktop CD can do that
via the install script ?
check out the hardware compatability list, most intel boards will
where is the list ?
sdb1 is marked as s spare
why md_d0 and not md0 and where are the other drives....
someone else was in here the other day with an almost identical problem. check your mdadm.conf
it was quite obscure as I remember
